abilities

Class Ability

  • java.lang.Object
    • abilities.Ability
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    EffectAbility, ProjectileAbility, SpawnAbility

    public abstract class Ability
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class used for creating Abilities.

    Abilities are custom actions that are used in-game with the E key if the slot is 0, Shift if 1, and Q if 2. The three native extensions include:

    • EffectAbility: Does something to the Character
    • ProjectileAbility: Spawns one or more Projectile Objects on use
    • SpawnAbility: Spawns one or more Friendly Objects on use

    The three activation methods include:

    • USE_ON_PRESS which will use the ability immediately on its respective button press.
    • USE_ON_SHOT which will toggle the ability on the button press, then can be used by shooting. Will end upon use
    • USE_MULTIPLE which will toggle, then can be used multiple times after toggle
    • EFFECT_PROJECTILE is to be used for ProjectileAbilities, and indicates the ability should not end immediately upon use

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
